guide.title: Game Guide
guide.description: Welcome to Match Puzzle Game! This is a free online puzzle game with 1000 challenging stages. It's a fun game where you match colorful gems to achieve goals.
guide.step1: Connect 3 or more gems of the same color horizontally or vertically. Connected gems will be automatically removed and gems above will fall down.
guide.step2: Click or touch a gem and drag it to an adjacent gem to swap positions. On mobile devices, you can use swipe gestures.
guide.step3: Each stage requires you to achieve a target score or collect gems of specific colors. You can check the current goal at the top of the screen.
guide.step4: Complete the goal within the limited number of moves to clear the stage and proceed to the next stage.
guide.specialGemsDescription: Connecting 4 or more gems creates special gems. Using special gems can give you higher scores and powerful effects.
guide.specialGem1: 4 gems: Explosion Gem - Removes 8 surrounding gems
guide.specialGem2: 5 gems: Lightning Gem - Removes an entire row or column
guide.specialGem3: T or L shape: Rainbow Gem - Removes all gems of the same color
guide.strategy1: Starting matches from the bottom can cause chain reactions as gems fall from above
guide.strategy2: Combining special gems can create even more powerful effects
guide.strategy3: Use the hint feature when you're running out of moves
guide.strategy4: Check each stage's goal first and plan your strategy accordingly
guide.tip1: Connecting 4 or more gems creates special gems
guide.tip2: Using special gems can help you get higher scores
guide.tip3: Use the hint feature when you're stuck
guide.tip4: Each stage has different goals, so play strategically
guide.tip5: Try to create chain reactions by making multiple matches in one move
guide.tip6: Look at the entire game board to find the best move

about.title: About the Game
about.description: Match Puzzle Game by CHIP GAMES is a free online puzzle game that you can play directly in your browser. No installation or registration required.
about.section1Content: This game consists of 1000 diverse stages, providing long-lasting entertainment. Beautiful graphics and smooth animations offer an immersive gaming experience. Intuitive controls make it easy for anyone to play, and it's optimized for both PC and mobile devices. The special gem system allows for more strategic gameplay, and the hint feature helps when you're stuck. Each stage has different goals and difficulty levels, so you'll never get bored.
about.section2Content: Each stage requires you to achieve a target score or collect gems of specific colors. Complete the goal within the limited number of moves to clear the stage and proceed to the next. When you clear a stage, you can receive star ratings based on your score, and getting all 3 stars is a perfect clear. Game progress is automatically saved, so you can continue playing anytime.
about.section3Content: CHIP GAMES is a game development studio that aims to provide users with fun and high-quality free games. All games use HTML5 technology and can be played directly in the browser without installation or registration. We prioritize user experience and continuously improve games and add new features. We strive to create games that users of all ages can enjoy.
about.section4Content: This game was developed using the latest web technologies (HTML5, Canvas, React). It's optimized to work on all major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and mobile devices. Responsive design automatically adjusts to various screen sizes and supports both touch and mouse controls. Game data is stored in the browser's local storage and is not transmitted to servers, ensuring privacy protection.
about.section5Content: CHIP GAMES continuously improves games and adds new features. Based on user feedback, we adjust game balance, add new stages, and improve features. More game modes and features are planned for the future. Update news can be found in the game.
about.section6Content: For game inquiries, bug reports, feature suggestions, etc., please contact us through the 'Contact Us' link at the bottom. Your feedback is greatly helpful for game improvement. We will respond as soon as possible. You can also find detailed information in the game guide and help pages.

help.title: Help
help.description: If you need help with the game, please contact us. Check frequently asked questions and troubleshooting methods.
help.section1Content: Match Puzzle Game is a puzzle game where you connect 3 or more gems of the same color to remove them. Each stage has a target score or specific gem collection goal. The game board consists of a 9x9 grid, and when you match gems, the gems above fall down due to gravity. If new matches are created during the fall, chain reactions occur, giving you additional points.
help.section2Content: On PC, click a gem with your mouse and drag it to an adjacent gem to swap positions. On mobile devices, touch a gem and use swipe gestures to swap positions. You cannot swap non-adjacent gems, and moves that don't create matches will be canceled. The pause and hint buttons are located at the bottom of the game board.
help.section3Content: Click the hint button during the game to show possible matches on the current board with arrows. Hints can only be used a limited number of times per stage, and using a hint does not consume a move. Using hints when stuck can help you find your next move.
help.section4Content: Click the pause button during the game to pause. While paused, the game board is displayed semi-transparently, and you can click the resume button at any time to continue. Game progress is automatically saved, and you can continue playing from where you left off even after closing and reopening the browser.
help.section5Content: When you clear each stage, you can receive star ratings based on your score. Getting all 3 stars is a perfect clear. Scores are determined by the number of gems matched, chain reactions, special gem usage, etc. To get high scores, it's important to create special gems and aim for chain reactions.
help.section6Content: If the game is not working properly or you find a bug, please let us know through the 'Contact Us' link at the bottom. If you can provide a way to reproduce the problem, we can resolve it faster. Also, updating your browser to the latest version or clearing the cache may resolve some issues.
help.section7Content: Q: Is game progress saved? A: Yes, game progress is automatically saved in your browser. Q: Can I continue my progress on another device? A: Currently, progress is only saved on the same browser. Q: The game runs slowly, what should I do? A: Update your browser to the latest version and try closing other tabs.

game.rotateSubtext: Landscape mode is recommended for better gameplay

footer.privacyContent: Privacy policy content will be displayed here. Please add the actual privacy policy content.
footer.contactContent: If you have any inquiries, please contact us via email or inquiry form. Please add actual contact information.
footer.privacySection1Content: This game collects only the minimum information necessary for gameplay. Game progress and settings are stored only on your device and are not transmitted to any server.
footer.privacySection2Content: The collected information is used to provide game services, save game progress, and improve user experience.
footer.privacySection3Title: 3. Retention and Use Period of Personal Information
footer.privacySection3Content: Game progress information is retained on your device until you delete the game or reset the data.
footer.privacySection4Title: 4. Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
footer.privacySection4Content: This game does not provide personal information to third parties. However, exceptions may apply when required by law.
footer.privacySection5Content: This game displays advertisements through Google AdSense. Google may use cookies to serve ads and provide personalized advertising based on your interests. You can view Google's privacy policy at https://policies.google.com/privacy. You can block cookies in your browser settings if you do not wish to use them.
footer.privacySection6Content: If you have any questions regarding privacy protection, please contact us at any time.
footer.contactSection1Content: If you encounter any problems while playing or have suggestions, please contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
footer.contactSection2Content: If you find a bug in the game, please let us know the situation and how to reproduce it. This will help us fix it quickly.
footer.contactSection3Content: We welcome your valuable feedback for game improvement. Please send us your suggestions for new features or improvement ideas.
footer.contactSection4Content: If you have any inquiries or suggestions about the game, please feel free to contact us. We will respond as soon as possible.

error.canvasNotSupported: Canvas is not supported in this browser
error.canvasFallbackMessage: To play the game, you need a browser that supports Canvas. Please update to the latest browser.
error.dataSaveFailedMessage: Unable to save game progress. Please check your browser's LocalStorage settings. Progress will only be maintained during this session.
error.gameLoadFailedMessage: An error occurred while loading the game. Please refresh the page or try again later.
error.storageUnavailableMessage: Browser storage is not available. Game progress will only be maintained during this session. Please check your browser settings.
error.networkErrorMessage: Please check your internet connection or try again later.
error.recoveryFailedMessage: Unable to load saved game state. Starting a new game.
error.title: An Error Occurred
error.messageWithDetails: The following error occurred: {error}. Please refresh the game.
